snippet.title: Momogatari - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Take another look at the gameplay and world of Momogatari in this trailer for the Metroidvania game. Momogatari is coming to PC, and a demo is available now on Steam. A Kickstarter campaign for Momogatari will launch in October 2024. Momogatari is a Metroidvania with frantic and fast-paced combat-focused gameplay, where the main character "Momotaro" explores the realm of darkness, or the "Yomi", which is filled with "Yokai" and ruled by "Kami", all drawn from Japanese folklore and mythology.
